Queries in Project and number of Records

Dec 17, 2008 â€¢ {"login"=>"evlpanda", "email"=>"m.nitschke@gmail.com", "display_name"=>"Michael Nitschke", "first_name"=>"", "last_name"=>""}

select
b.qryname
, b.descr
, b.descrlong
, (select count(*) from PSQRYRECORD where qryname = b.qryname) as Num_Records
from
psprojectitem a
, psqrydefn b
where a.projectname = 'UQXM1210'
and b.qryname = a.objectvalue1
order by 4
